segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach that cookie jar, standing on his tiptoes on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the determination on his face as he tries to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable; it's making me nervous just watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is eagerly waiting for her share, her arm raised and palm open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before or if it's their first cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is holding a plate in one hand, probably to catch the cookies or use as a lid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit envious of their bravery and teamwork, even if it's for a sneaky purpose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors frame the boy's figure, making him look even more precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they can grab those cookies quickly and get down safely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still oblivious, drying dishes and not noticing the children's antics.
segments.speaker: PAR
